title: Esther’s NM2207 Website
text:
Self-Introduction
Welcome to my website!! I’m Esther, a Year 2 Sociology major who is minoring in Communications and New Media and Film Studies. I enjoy travelling, photography and outdoor activities like frisbee and hiking. What I love about all these activities is the ability to capture memoriable moments and get to know more people and culture.
In here, you’ll find the links to my Github from my journey in NM2207 and have the opportunity to explore my data story project and browse some of my personal photos that I took recently.

Happy exploring!!!

title: Data Story Project
text:
About
As part of the final project of NM2207, we are tasked to create a data story from our choice of data set. In view of that, I’ve chosen to base my data story and project on a data set I’ve found about Spotify.
As someone who really loves to listen music, I’m interested to explore any observable correlations between the popularity of Spotify songs and the elements of the music to find out if there are specific factors that influences the popularity of music.
